algorithm_technique: Iterate backwards, counting consecutive '1's to determine character types.
problem_summary_simple: Determine if the last character in a binary array is a single bit (0) or two bits (10 or 11).
problem_summary_technical: Analyze the trailing bits of the array to infer the encoding of the last character.
key_insights: The problem can be solved by looking at the bits from right to left.
A '0' signifies the end of a character (either 1-bit or 2-bit).
Consecutive '1's before a '0' indicate a 2-bit character.
